content: I’ve been making decisions lately too and most of them were unorthodox. My family and parents quite couldn’t understand why I decided to take another path. I still couldn’t make them fully understand it now. But since I have made this decision with all my heart, I am going to take this path and make them understand later on as I become better at what I chose to do. Thanks for this wonderful article. Your articles are always easy to resonate with.
